channel.title: Video Understanding on AI Paper Reviews by AI
channel.description: Recent content in Video Understanding on AI Paper Reviews by AI
channel.copyright: Â© 2025 AI Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: Diffusion as Shader: 3D-aware Video Diffusion for Versatile Video Generation Control
item.description: Diffusion as Shader (DaS) achieves versatile video control by using 3D tracking videos as control signals in a unified video diffusion model, enabling precise manipulation across diverse tasks.

item.title: MotionBench: Benchmarking and Improving Fine-grained Video Motion Understanding for Vision Language Models
item.description: MotionBench, a new benchmark, reveals that existing video models struggle with fine-grained motion understanding. To address this, the authors propose TE Fusion, a novel architecture that improves mo…

item.title: STAR: Spatial-Temporal Augmentation with Text-to-Video Models for Real-World Video Super-Resolution
item.description: STAR: A novel approach uses text-to-video models for realistic, temporally consistent real-world video super-resolution, improving image quality and detail.

item.title: TransPixar: Advancing Text-to-Video Generation with Transparency
item.description: TransPixar generates high-quality videos with transparency by jointly training RGB and alpha channels, outperforming sequential generation methods.

item.title: GS-DiT: Advancing Video Generation with Pseudo 4D Gaussian Fields through Efficient Dense 3D Point Tracking
item.description: GS-DiT: Generating high-quality videos with advanced 4D control through efficient dense 3D point tracking and pseudo 4D Gaussian fields.

item.title: Ingredients: Blending Custom Photos with Video Diffusion Transformers
item.description: Ingredients: A new framework customizes videos by blending multiple photos with video diffusion transformers, enabling realistic and personalized video generation while maintaining consistent identity…

item.title: SeedVR: Seeding Infinity in Diffusion Transformer Towards Generic Video Restoration
item.description: SeedVR: A novel diffusion transformer revolutionizes generic video restoration by efficiently handling arbitrary video lengths and resolutions, achieving state-of-the-art performance.

item.title: VideoAnydoor: High-fidelity Video Object Insertion with Precise Motion Control
item.description: VideoAnydoor: High-fidelity video object insertion with precise motion control, achieved via an end-to-end framework leveraging an ID extractor and a pixel warper for robust detail preservation and fi…

item.title: DiTCtrl: Exploring Attention Control in Multi-Modal Diffusion Transformer for Tuning-Free Multi-Prompt Longer Video Generation
item.description: DiTCtrl achieves state-of-the-art multi-prompt video generation without retraining by cleverly controlling attention in a diffusion transformer, enabling smooth transitions between video segments.

item.title: LeviTor: 3D Trajectory Oriented Image-to-Video Synthesis
item.description: LeviTor: Revolutionizing image-to-video synthesis with intuitive 3D trajectory control, generating realistic videos from static images by abstracting object masks into depth-aware control points.

item.title: AniDoc: Animation Creation Made Easier
item.description: AniDoc automates cartoon animation line art video colorization, making animation creation easier!

item.title: MIVE: New Design and Benchmark for Multi-Instance Video Editing
item.description: Edit many objects at once in videos! MIVE does it accurately without affecting other areas, a big step for AI video editing.

item.title: Move-in-2D: 2D-Conditioned Human Motion Generation
item.description: Move-in-2D generates realistic human motion sequences conditioned on a 2D scene image and text prompt, overcoming limitations of existing approaches and improving video synthesis.

item.title: VidTok: A Versatile and Open-Source Video Tokenizer
item.description: VidTok: an open-source, top performing video tokenizer.

item.title: Gaze-LLE: Gaze Target Estimation via Large-Scale Learned Encoders
item.description: Gaze-LLE achieves state-of-the-art gaze estimation by using a frozen DINOv2 encoder and a lightweight decoder, simplifying architecture and improving efficiency.

item.title: InstanceCap: Improving Text-to-Video Generation via Instance-aware Structured Caption
item.description: InstanceCap improves text-to-video generation through detailed, instance-aware captions.

item.title: Mobile Video Diffusion
item.description: MobileVD: The first mobile-optimized video diffusion model, achieving 523x efficiency improvement over state-of-the-art with minimal quality loss, enabling realistic video generation on smartphones.

item.title: ObjCtrl-2.5D: Training-free Object Control with Camera Poses
item.description: ObjCtrl-2.5D: Training-free, precise image-to-video object control using 3D trajectories and camera poses.

item.title: Video Motion Transfer with Diffusion Transformers
item.description: DiTFlow: training-free video motion transfer using Diffusion Transformers, enabling realistic motion control in synthesized videos via Attention Motion Flow.

item.title: MoViE: Mobile Diffusion for Video Editing
item.description: MoViE: Mobile Diffusion for Video Editing achieves 12 FPS video editing on mobile phones by optimizing existing image editing models, achieving a major breakthrough in on-device video processing.

item.title: LiFT: Leveraging Human Feedback for Text-to-Video Model Alignment
item.description: LiFT leverages human feedback, including reasoning, to effectively align text-to-video models with human preferences, significantly improving video quality.

item.title: Mind the Time: Temporally-Controlled Multi-Event Video Generation
item.description: MinT: Generating coherent videos with precisely timed, multiple events via temporal control, surpassing existing methods.

item.title: Mimir: Improving Video Diffusion Models for Precise Text Understanding
item.description: Mimir: A novel framework harmonizes LLMs and video diffusion models for precise text understanding in video generation, producing high-quality videos with superior text comprehension.

item.title: OmniCreator: Self-Supervised Unified Generation with Universal Editing
item.description: OmniCreator: Self-supervised unified image+video generation & universal editing.

item.title: VideoGen-of-Thought: A Collaborative Framework for Multi-Shot Video Generation
item.description: VideoGen-of-Thought (VGoT) creates high-quality, multi-shot videos by collaboratively generating scripts, keyframes, and video clips, ensuring narrative consistency and visual coherence.

item.title: Long Video Diffusion Generation with Segmented Cross-Attention and Content-Rich Video Data Curation
item.description: Presto: a novel video diffusion model generates 15-second, high-quality videos with unparalleled long-range coherence and rich content, achieved through a segmented cross-attention mechanism and the L…

item.title: PhysGame: Uncovering Physical Commonsense Violations in Gameplay Videos
item.description: PhysGame benchmark unveils video LLMs’ weaknesses in understanding physical commonsense from gameplay videos, prompting the creation of PhysVLM, a knowledge-enhanced model that outperforms existing mo…

item.title: VideoLights: Feature Refinement and Cross-Task Alignment Transformer for Joint Video Highlight Detection and Moment Retrieval
item.description: VideoLights: a novel framework for joint video highlight detection & moment retrieval, boosts performance via feature refinement, cross-modal & cross-task alignment, achieving state-of-the-art results…

item.title: VISTA: Enhancing Long-Duration and High-Resolution Video Understanding by Video Spatiotemporal Augmentation
item.description: VISTA synthesizes long-duration, high-resolution video instruction data, creating VISTA-400K and HRVideoBench to significantly boost video LMM performance.

item.title: Timestep Embedding Tells: It's Time to Cache for Video Diffusion Model
item.description: TeaCache: a training-free method boosts video diffusion model speed by up to 4.41x with minimal quality loss by cleverly caching intermediate outputs.

item.title: Trajectory Attention for Fine-grained Video Motion Control
item.description: Trajectory Attention enhances video motion control by injecting trajectory information, improving precision and long-range consistency in video generation.

item.title: Video Depth without Video Models
item.description: RollingDepth: Achieving state-of-the-art video depth estimation without using complex video models, by cleverly extending a single-image depth estimator.

item.title: AC3D: Analyzing and Improving 3D Camera Control in Video Diffusion Transformers
item.description: AC3D achieves precise 3D camera control in video diffusion transformers by analyzing camera motion’s spectral properties, optimizing pose conditioning, and using a curated dataset of dynamic videos.

item.title: TAPTRv3: Spatial and Temporal Context Foster Robust Tracking of Any Point in Long Video
item.description: TAPTRv3 achieves state-of-the-art long-video point tracking by cleverly using spatial and temporal context to enhance feature querying, surpassing previous methods and demonstrating strong performance…

item.title: WF-VAE: Enhancing Video VAE by Wavelet-Driven Energy Flow for Latent Video Diffusion Model
item.description: WF-VAE boosts video VAE performance with wavelet-driven energy flow and causal caching, enabling 2x higher throughput and 4x lower memory usage in latent video diffusion models.

item.title: DreamRunner: Fine-Grained Storytelling Video Generation with Retrieval-Augmented Motion Adaptation
item.description: DREAMRUNNER generates high-quality storytelling videos by using LLMs for hierarchical planning, motion retrieval, and a novel spatial-temporal region-based diffusion model for fine-grained control.

item.title: Efficient Long Video Tokenization via Coordinated-based Patch Reconstruction
item.description: CoordTok: a novel video tokenizer drastically reduces token count for long videos, enabling memory-efficient training of diffusion models for high-quality, long video generation.

item.title: MagicDriveDiT: High-Resolution Long Video Generation for Autonomous Driving with Adaptive Control
item.description: MagicDriveDiT generates high-resolution, long street-view videos with precise control, exceeding limitations of previous methods in autonomous driving.

item.title: SAMURAI: Adapting Segment Anything Model for Zero-Shot Visual Tracking with Motion-Aware Memory
item.description: SAMURAI enhances the Segment Anything Model 2 for real-time, zero-shot visual object tracking by incorporating motion-aware memory and motion modeling, significantly improving accuracy and robustness.

item.title: AnimateAnything: Consistent and Controllable Animation for Video Generation
item.description: AnimateAnything: A unified approach enabling precise & consistent video manipulation via a novel optical flow representation and frequency stabilization.

item.title: Number it: Temporal Grounding Videos like Flipping Manga
item.description: Boosting video temporal grounding, NumPro empowers Vid-LLMs by adding frame numbers, making temporal localization as easy as flipping through manga.

item.title: EgoVid-5M: A Large-Scale Video-Action Dataset for Egocentric Video Generation
item.description: EgoVid-5M: First high-quality dataset for egocentric video generation, enabling realistic human-centric world simulations.

item.title: Sharingan: Extract User Action Sequence from Desktop Recordings
item.description: Sharingan extracts user action sequences from desktop recordings using novel VLM-based methods, achieving 70-80% accuracy and enabling RPA.

item.title: ReCapture: Generative Video Camera Controls for User-Provided Videos using Masked Video Fine-Tuning
item.description: ReCapture generates videos with novel camera angles from user videos using masked video fine-tuning, preserving scene motion and plausibly hallucinating unseen parts.

item.title: Adaptive Caching for Faster Video Generation with Diffusion Transformers
item.description: Adaptive Caching (AdaCache) dramatically speeds up video generation with diffusion transformers by cleverly caching and reusing computations, tailoring the process to each video’s complexity and motio…

item.title: How Far is Video Generation from World Model: A Physical Law Perspective
item.description: Scaling video generation models doesn’t guarantee they’ll learn physics; this study reveals they prioritize visual cues over true physical understanding.

item.title: Learning Video Representations without Natural Videos
item.description: High-performing video representation models can be trained using only synthetic videos and images, eliminating the need for large natural video datasets.
